content.altitude: Treetop, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Well i can start by tellin you my story... 
ever since i was a child i have always been different. i used to see alot of things that was unexplained. on september of last year, i started seeing strange lights every single day. you see i love working out and hiking so i go jogging everyday at 7 o'clock with my dog and the next hour by myself. but everyday i saw these lights that were just amazing and so beautiful and they hung high and sometimes low in the sky. some are flashing lights and some flash but will be still in the sky, way different than helicopter lights and plane lights. to ensure myself that i wasn't seeing things, one night when i was out jogging with my dog i called my friend and told her to step outside to see one of the lights this one was this huge white light it was kind of steady but it still flashed on and off. when i called her and she stepped out side as soon as i asked her if she saw it the light went in another direction! she saw it too and was amazed! also i had two other people see it and they too were shocked and amazed sometimes there will be dozens of these lights spread out in the sky. a couple of weeks after i started seeing the lights, i saw a beautiful memorizing craft. again i was out walking my dog, and everytime i go walking or jogging i listen to music. well this night was a dark night and everything was so still and calm and i didn't notice this at the time but there was barely any cars going by in my neighborhood at all. so every house in my neighborhood have trees in the yards, and the houses are really tall and wide. so i'm walking and i see this white light coming from behind this house and one of the trees and it was very low so i freaked out because i thought a plane or something was about to crash (that's how low it was). so i took a couple of steps back and as it came across this craft was so long and the front was like no other i've ever seen before and the side was almost like a very distinctive check mark and the lights were these pretty blue lights and it was flying soooooo low, and barely made a sound, also the window of the front was very dark so i couldn't see inside. i wanted to get my phone out and take a video but something wouldn't let me do it. on down the road trying to get home i ran into my friend going in his house from practice and i asked if he could walk me home soo he did. but we ended up going jogging for a mile after we dropped off my dog and way off in the distance i saw the craft again! and he did too but it was far off in the distance. til this day i still see the lights off and on. i have a great nikon camera but it sucks cause it doesn't have night vision the guy from national ufo center wanted me to seen a video. but every sense then i had some strange dreams about what i saw and about people after me. about two weeks ago, woke up to this terrible back ache and i was just soo sick it was just so random for it to happen and then next day i was fine. i really don't know what to make of this at all. i really need help. this has just happen but in the past two nights not counting yesterday i saw three shooting stars. a couple of days ago my friend and eye wanted to go start gazing and see if we could catch something in the woods, and he too saw the strange lights and not only that but this small light appeared to drop out the sky and into the woods that i can not explain. 
again i still til this day see strange lights and things in the sky, i'm being honest and truthful i just need help, please. thank you.
content.summary: Flashing lights that shift in the sky and a strange huge object.

content.detailedDescription:
Encounter on a lonely desert road
by [witness name removed cms/dr]

     the beams of my headlights seemed to be chasing elusive shadows cast against the desert sage as i drove through the dark moonless night towards congress, arizona.  retired now, a gold prospector with the time to fulfill my quest for the big nugget, my thoughts then were of gold and only gold���that was about to change.  just about midnight and just south of the middle of nowhere, i had stopped and pulled off the road to relieve myself and take a break from driving, and it was at this moment that i first saw what i thought to be a helicopter with a bright searchlight circling the area southwest of me.  having served with the u.S.A.F., i have seen many types of aircraft, but this was something i had never seen before. it was a red light intermittently beaming a brilliant, focused white light down to the ground as if to be looking for someone or something, and i thought what or who would be way out there, and why there were no strobe i.D. lights on the helicopter.  i didn���t give it much more thought and got back in the car and grabbed a cigarette, lit up and gazed back towards the southwest. the chopper was now circling closer to me and although my window was down, there was no noise���and i thought that was really strange.  suddenly, what i thought was a helicopter flying at 500 feet was much smaller and much closer; in fact, it was now just on the other side of the road and was about 10 feet off the ground, hovering. i flicked the cigarette out the window.  i rubbed my eyes in disbelief. am i hallucinating?
     ���what the ____ is that?��� my heart beating fast and my mind spinning, i watched as the object as it moved through the sparse vegetation, stopping now and then to illuminate the ground beneath with its powerful beam of white light, and then it appeared to morph into two tiny red lights, like twin led���s (light emitting diodes) and started to cross the road towards me.  now as it approached my car, it suddenly morphed back into its former shape:  a spherical orb about the size of a softball, bright red (dot emergency red, like a tail-light).  was this military?  is this a living organism? perhaps an alien probe?  it was now six feet in front of my car, four feet off the ground, just hovering. what the ____is this thing???  somehow, i don���t think it���s military���no stars, insignia or guns���(chuckle)
i noticed that although the red light emitted from this thing was very bright to my eyes, it wasn���t casting shadows and did not reflect from the surrounding bushes or from the polished surface of my hood.  i could see the surface of this thing seemed to be fluid-   like, and composed of what appeared to be millions of tiny dots of light swirling around very fast and was very hard for my eyes to focus on it.  the perimeter seemed to fuzz out at the edges, like an aura or halo.  the light seemed to be luminous rather than projected, and was not radiating any heat that i could feel. 
     it���s amazing what goes through your head when confronted with an un-known like this��� a memory of dr. xxxxxxx of  s.E.T.I. explaining that most ufo sightings are mostly swamp gas or weather balloons���hey doc!  here���s one that will fit right up your telescope!
     at this moment, i was toying with the idea of getting out of my car to approach the orb and try to communicate with it.  
suddenly, the orb started to move a little closer to me, and my curiosity was overcome by fear��� i felt panic consume me and simultaneously engaged the engine and hit the lights.  the orb reacted by backing away slightly.  illuminated by my headlights, i could plainly see that there were no mechanical parts or structure. i slammed the gearshift into drive, and floored it.  i wanted to put as much distance between that thing and me as fast as possible.  i warily glanced in the rear-view mirror and was horrified to realize that it was pursuing me down the road at 90 mph.
i grabbed my cell phone and hurriedly called 911.  no service.  i started laughing out loud.  who the hell would believe me if i reported being chased by a hovering, glowing red softball?  they would think i was drunk or stoned out of mind! 
     the little town of congress had already rolled up the sidewalks and turned off the lights, and not a soul stirring���well, it was 1:00 a.M. arizona time.  i decided to park in a vacant lot near the fire station right off the main highway. 
     for the next two or three hours, i watched odd lights moving through the dark moonless night.  i found that my eyesight had been affected by looking at the orb, and i could not focus on any bright light source. whatever i tried looking at seemed to move away into periphery. needless to say, i stayed parked there and tried my best to go to sleep and forget about what i had seen.
     later, when i arrived home in california a couple of days later, i also noticed that my eyesight had not only been temporarily affected, but it had improved to some extent, and now can read small print without the use of my reading glasses.
     i have shared this story with a few friends, but i notice that their eyes glaze over and i realize that they don���t believe what i saw.  if someone told me this story, i don���t think that i would believe it myself.  all said, i swear that this report is absolutely true and accurate to the best of my knowledge.


concise report:


date:  may 19, 2010
location:  3 miles west of congress, arizona   34n09���06.16   112w52���50.13
time:  approximately 0100hrs 
conditions:  very dark, clear sky, stars visible, no clouds, wind 0-5mph
temperature:  67 degrees f.          
ufo shape:  perfect sphere, orb, approx. 4-6 inches in diameter
ufo color:  bright red  (dot emergency red)
distance at first sight:  approximately ��� mile to the southwest @ 30 degrees
elevation at first sight:  approximately 500 feet above the ground. 
proximity: (closeness) 6 feet 	
origin:  unknown
purpose:  seemingly searching for something, curious
composition:  plasma, pure light, ability to transform itself, ???
mode of flight:  unknown
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Confronted and chased by a softball size red orb

content.detailedDescription:
Date 2-5-11: time 5:23 p.M.: almost no clouds, sunny afternoon

i live on a mountain (3k+ feet osl) east of asheville nc.

i was casually standing out on my deck observing 3 hawks circling to the south of me. then i noticed what at first i thought was a jet liner in the distance behind the hawks, moving east to west at a lower-than-normal rate of speed. but it seemed different in shape (as the wings were not discernable) and speed and was south of me maybe 5 miles. i quickly got my binoculars and observed what appeared to be a craft changing from an airliner (with a solid red tail, and that may be important) to a long cigar-shaped and bright silver craft. for maybe 5 seconds the craft disappeared behind some branches of trees in my view and after that the craft was nowhere to be seen in its ongoing trajectory/flight path.  it had literally disappeared.

i'm a former pilot (with over 25k hours of flight time in all kinds of weather conditions) and i know all kinds of aircraft.  this craft, again, changed, into something else completely and then disappeared!  that was a first for me, as i've seen many ufo's in my personal and flying career.

*(wit's name deleted--cms/sg).
asheville nc
content.summary: Airliner changed shape - then disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
Living in danbury ct at the time & working at sikorsky aircraft in stratford ct (where i'm still employed). i've worked third shift since 1984. my dad is a pilot, ive flown many hours with him in ga aircraft & have many airline miles under my belt. i'm an a&p mechanic & have worked on everything from light aircraft to business jets apart from my full time job at sikorsky. at sikorsky i work on all the hawk series (army & navy), s76, s92, ch53e, mh53e. ive been in aviation all my life & i know how aircraft look & sound in flight. 
 one night on the way to work going down rt 25 thru trumbull & monroe there is a section of road that changes from a two lane to a divided highway & also crosses rt 111. there is a stoplight there before you get on to the highway part of rt 25 heading south. as i was stopped at the light heading south i noticed in the distance bright white lights. initially i thought it was an airliner low & slow which at the time would be very unusual. it was big. after proceeding thru the light the highway bends to the right a bit & as i rounded the curve i saw several cars pulled over & people out of their cars. it took me a couple of seconds to realize they were watching this object i thought was an airliner. as i was slowing down trying to watch this object in the sky & watch where i was going, i realized this was not any kind of normal aircraft. i pulled over & got out & as i watched closely i saw seven clusters of lights. red green & white in a chevron or boomerang pattern. at this time (late 80's) there had been rumors of ultralights flying at night trying to look like ufos & spook people. i thought maybe thats what it was since i realized it was flying too slow to be any kind of large aircraft. as it got closer i kept waiting to hear noise, jet noise, recip noise, wind thru the wires type of noise. nothing, totally silent. as it passed overhead ( approx 1000 ft) i would say the span was approx 200 -300 ft. thats when i really got scared. the weather was hot & humid at the time but you could see the stars. as the object passed overhead (still totally silent) it blocked out the stars & you could see a solid shape. this was not any formation flight of ultralights or small airplanes, this was big & silent. i think thats the only time in my life when i felt the hair on the back of my neck go up. it was moving a little faster than the northbound traffic on the other side of the highway maybe 70 -90 mph. as we watched it just slowly continued north until it was out of sight. i want to say some people had called in to the local radio station (wicc bridgeport) but i dont remember for sure. well, thats what i saw & thats the only one ive ever seen. i always thought it would be fantastic to meet et's or whatever but this experience scared me. it was a very strange thought provoking experience...
content.summary: Flyover

content.detailedDescription: Took a pic of the clouds.  changed the contrast and brightness.....  and low and behold.
content.summary: Took a picture of a cloud.

content.detailedDescription:
This object was seen on two occasions the 3rd nd the fifth the object was seen north over the ocen from honokaa town the fifth at around 530 am and it was moving as if to return to a particular point in the sky the pattern was not random but each ime it moved 6 inches it would then move back it flashed a blue flase several times and then disapeaed a similar event happened on the 3rd in a differnt place in the sky around 2am it wa not anything like i have ever seen and i watch the sky nightly when weather permits
there comming
h
content.summary: Starlike object that wasw moving in a unrandom pattern flashes and moving

content.detailedDescription:
I was in clyde, wiping down my truck, when something caught the corner of my eye. i turned and saw this unusual shaped thing hovering over the power lines... i reached for my cell phone and snapped a picture of it.
the craft was there for what felt like an eternity, but was approximately a minute. its lower edges pulsed and glowed white. it was completely silent but the strange thing about it was i could almost feel it's presence. it is hard for me to explain, almost like touching a 9volt battery to your tongue but milder and throughout the body. almost made me lose balance... as i stared at whatever that was, it just vanished, i mean, it just disappeared... no sound, no trail, no sonic boom, no visual distortions...
i do realize that i live close to an afb . and i know they do some top secret stuff there, but this what i saw would not be part of our human weapons arsenal.  to move the way that thing did, no chance a human could handle the shock without instant death.
aftermath: felt a bit euphoric i guess or it was the excitement of seeing something out of the ordinary... let's not kid ourselves people... we are not alone.

i was there with my friend who wishes to remain anonymous, for fear of being ridiculed . i am just sending you this photo in hopes that you can figure out what it is i got a picture of. i wish to remain anonymous but feel free to ask me questions if you should need.

i am a big fan of your work. expose the truth !
content.summary: Something caught my peripheral ,there it was hovering,grabbed my cell phone and snapped a shot

content.detailedDescription:
Just viewed your program titled "ufos over earth" last night. it was the episode about various ufo sightings in bucks county. i became extremely interested in denise murter's description of the object she observed. it was exactly the same object we saw on the night of 1/27/1990. so i figured i should report the sighting to mufon.

my wife and i were attending a black tie annual awards banquet at the brookville country club located in upper macungie, pa. just south of allentown, pa. i was driving and my wife was in the passenger seat. we were driving west towards the brookville country club. i observed a circular object at 12 o'clock high above us about one mile east of our destination. we thought it could have been an airliner but it did not move like an airplane. it had 3 white headlights surrounded my red lights. it was difficult to tell whether the red lights could have been blinking or rotating. the ufo was high in the sky, estimated 500 to 1,000 feet above us. it dissapeared from my line of sight as i drove under it. however, my wife kept observing it. she said that it moved eratically and disappeared quickly.

we read in the philadelphia inquirer that there were several ufo sightings that night around the philadelphia area.
content.summary: Observed circular object  with 3 white lights surrounded by revolving or blinking red lights,

content.detailedDescription:
Watch the video and read the description. search you tube for "ufo departure". update on jan. 16th, 2011 sighting. there have been only 6 or 7 clear days since then.  i checked this area of the sky every single morning since then...And there was nothing up there.  it was empty in that entire area. 

video description: it moves slowly south and you can tell the camera is still and i am not talking about the clouds moving by, either. place your cursor in the middle of the screen as a reference...This thing is moving, south...Toward norridge. watch from 4:37 to 4:45 to see points of reference...Etc. i zoomed back out...Then zoomed back in. this is exactly why i kept filming (jan. 16th, 2011). i picked up on a 2nd camera, (in standard definition) when my card ran out of room on the other (hd) camera. there is no glass or screen in front of me, so no it is not a reflection, either. it is not venus or a satellite, because in the clear days since then...It would have been around the same area from 5:00 am to 7:00 am.  there is absolutely nothing up there.

i actually filmed the ufo for a total of 94 minutes. i wanted to catch it leaving...Or vanishing into thin air on film. my camera was adjusted a few times, but still and stationary on a mini tripod...You can totally see when i adjust the camera a few times, but for the most part...I left the camera alone the last 25 minutes of filming this thing. yet...You can see the craft move across your screen (south) and you can see it slowly moving upward and a bit higher in altitude. it flies into cloud cover and out of view. just fades away. see other videos under "ufo in hd", feel free to download any of these files and feel free to through rigorous testing.  i did not touch any of my files and i stand by them (unlike the people who filmed the ufo in jerusalem.)  where are they?  none of the people who uploaded any of those videos will answer any questions on you tube.  the burden of proof is on the person who shot the film. period. not only do i stand by mine, but i promise to get it much closer on film next time. i have had 2 close encounters that you can find in the mufon database. this thing was close enough to see details and was without question...Under intelligent control.  it was either experimental or extraterrestrial.
content.summary: Search you tube for "ufo departure"

content.detailedDescription:
I believe it was october, but the year was definately 1966 and i was 11 years old.  my father owned a small business and i went with him to deliver an order to 13000 farmington rd. livonia mi.  he attached the package to the front door and we left heading westbound on industrial rd.  at the corner we turned right and headed northbound on farmington rd.

i was looking out the passenger door glass and from behind moving in a north-northwest direction some bright lights caught my eye and before it registered in my brain of what i was actually seeing, i blurted out to my father, "dad, that plane is so low, i can see in the windows!!!"  then i noticed the windows were slowly rotating around what appeared to be a disc shaped craft and i was totally confused.  another thing that had stuck in my mind was that each pane of glass had a blue tint near the frame and the color reminded me of a flourescent tube light bulb.  the craft remained to the right of our car, but it was moving faster and within a couple seconds my father could see it through the front windshield.  all excited he yelled, "thats no plane, it's a flying saucer!  we stopped at the next corner which was schoolcraft rd and we watched it for about a 20 seconds. it crossed our path and changed direction and began to head west.

my dad had to go to the post office, so he turned eastbound on schoolcraft rd. out the back window, my eyes stayed glued to the object and i noticed the craft began circling back around and was heading east-southeast.  so i told my dad it's coming back and he accelerated the car to about 70mph but the craft was gaining ground on us fast.  we reached merriman rd and my dad turned right (southbound) and he tried to intercept the craft for a second time.  we weren't able to catch it so he stopped the car a couple hundred feet north of the c&o railroad crossing and we just watched it for about 5 minutes.  it circled the wonderland shopping center at middlebelt and plymouth rds, then proceeded toward downtown detroit.  another car had also stopped, but we did not talk to him, i wish we did.

the sky was very clear that night.  other then the windows, you could not make out any other features.  (i'm thinking back and maybe it was a new moon, and that's why i couldn't see anything but the windows).  i would estimate the speed at about 300 mph.  there was no sound.  i would estimate the size similar to a 707 airliner or maybe a little larger, although the windows were much bigger then on a typical airliner.  if you held a ruler at arms length, it would have measured about 4-1/2 inches across when it passed near the car.  it was not marsh gases either!

when i first saw the object it was about 1000 feet off of my 4 o'clock position and about a 1000 feet high.  the upward viewing angle was close to 45 degrees.  by the time my dad saw it through the front windshield, it was about 500 feet off my 2 0'clock position and still flying at the same altitude.  at that time our upward viewing angle was about 60 degrees and it eventually crossed our path, maybe an 1/8 mile up the road.

when the craft circled wonderland center the altitude was probably closer to 2500 to 3000 feet.

it did not fly irratically.  it was very smooth.

my feelings were mixed, for as cool as it was, i was scared s***less.  i didn't have nightmares, but i was always watching my back for several years after.

at school i remember telling my close friend ron a. about what occurred the night before.  he didn't believe me, but i guess that was expected.

i'm a former graphic artist so i enclosed a map of livonia michigan which shows the ufo's flight path.  the story begins at the yellow circle and star.  the colors correspond to where the car was in relation to where the ufo was.  i also enclosed a computer generated illustration of the ufo.  if you size the ufo drawing on your monitor to 4-1/2 inches wide, that's about how big it appeared in the sky.  it was huge!

if you have any information related to this ufo incident, or if the description is similar to another sighting, please let me know.

thank you.
content.summary: Low flying and slow moving ufo,  you could clearly see the windows rotate slowly around the disc shape.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving my suv with my 16 year old son and his girlfriend who were riding in the back seat. my son was sitting in the middle and his girlfriend was on the passanger side.  we live just off i-95 exit 38 and we were taking his girlfriend to her grandmother's house off exit 29.  this was friday evening just before midnight labor day weekend 2009.  i was heading south on i-95, traveling over a small bridge, and thought it was very odd that i didn't see any headlights in the northbound lanes nor any taillights in front of me.  as i traveled a little further south, i looked in my rearview mirror and didn't see any headlights behind me.  this is very strange for a holiday weekend since we live in a popular tourist area exactly between savannah, ga and jacksonville, fl.  after looking in all directions again, i was staring straight ahead and noticed a bright whiteish blue ball of light(similar to the color of a halogen car headlight) rise up quickly from the center of the southbound lane. i estimated it to be about the size of a basketball given the distance between the object and my vehicle. it was approximately 3/4 of a mile in front of me and i estimate the object to rise about 10-12 feet off the roadway.  it hovered for aproximately 4 full seconds then moved west horizontally at a very high rate of speed.  it covered 50-60 yards in less than 1 second and then disappeared into the tree line.  

i couldn't believe what i saw and i knew immediately it was a ufo.  on this stretch of i-95 there were no lights of any kind, there were no airplanes or stars in the sky and absolutely no traffic on the road.  the kids were silent so i wasn't sure if they saw it.  i then asked "did you just see anything wierd?".  my son shockingly responded "i just saw a ball of light shoot off into the trees!"  i asked him what color it was and he indicated it was a whiteish blue color.  i was so excited because he confirmed what i saw.  as we approached the area where we felt it entered the trees, i slowed down to see if we could see anything but it was gone.  again, i looked around in all directions and there were no visible vehicle lights or any other lights in the sky.  several days later, i drove by the area where this occured to see if i could tell where it entered into the trees, but nothing looked to be disturbed.  

i told my mother about the experience and she told me that in the late 70's she and my father (retired air force pilot) were crossing the bridge to jekyll island and they both witnessed a ball of light coming up from the water and disappearing in the sky.  jekyll island is approximately 15 miles southeast of where i experienced my ufo.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Ball of light seen on i-95 few miles north of exit 29

content.detailedDescription:
i watched your show for the first time tonight. there was a man that said, these things can last seconds to months and it's important to report it because you never know when it's going to be gone. that inspired me to make this report. 
  my wife came to me the begining of jan. this year. she works the graveyard shift at a world class hotel. she was telling me about this light she keeps seeing when she gets home in the morning. she gets home around 4:30 am. it's still very dark out. the sun has not yet begun to come up. we have had a sighting together before so when she came to me, i took her very serious. on one of her nights off about three weeks ago, we stayed up real late together and deciceded to go take a look. sure enough, it was there. at first glance it looks like a star. a bright star sitting exceptionally low in the sky. almost as if it's a light on the mountain line in the backround but, it's not. it's above the mountain line. when i saw it i thought, "after what we've seen in the past why would she be so adimant about this?" i went in the house and got my bionoculars. got it lined up and realized this thing was changing shape and color. it was moving really slow. the thing that got me was when we went in the house to get the bionoculars by the time we got back it had jumped in the sky an unreal distance. we were inside for mabey 3 min and had come back out to find that it had moved so far to the south and had raised up. gotten much higher. it was incredible. i don't have anything to see this thing up close. my bionoculars aren't the best but this has to be some kind of oddity. it's not there every night. it's not in the same spot every night. it's always in the same area but never the same spot so i know it's not a star. i know it's not a backround light. i can't identify this thing and would like your help figuring this out.
  i didn't believe in this stuff until about a year and a half ago. my wife and were leaving a friends house at ten o'clock pm here in las vegas. we had our children and put them in the car to go home. as i was getting in the car we saw these ufo's coming over the hilltop. looked like something out of independence day film. they were so low to the mountain i couldn't believe my eyes. yhey started about 50 yards to my left, coming over the hill at maybey 15mph. not fast at all. i quickly grabbed my flashlight and started flashing them. one by one they came over the hill and the more that came over, the closer they got. by that i mean the 50 yards to the left was getting smaller and smaller. they were lining up with us. by the time they were inline with us one of them stopped over my car. it shined the scarriest, brightest light over our car. it was undescribeable. i just don't have the words. they were all completely silent. not a sound. absoloutely nothing. the ufo slowly took off after shutting the light off. i decided to follow it. we followed these things for about 20 miles into a residential area near henderson nv. i know what i'm saying sounds crazy but because of this, i'm a believer. my wife can confirm everything that i have said. she was with me for both these "events". i know i'm not crazy and i know these things are here. i just need your help to prove it. i appreciate your time and look forward to hearing from you guys. thank you.
content.summary: There's a light in the sky that has been there most nights since the end of dec. 2010

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking a friend home early morning from the night before on march 31, 1979. the two of us sat in my van for a moment and where just saying good night. we noticed a extremely brite light low in the sky and initially thought it mite be a star low on the horizon but realized it was to close to be a star but it was so brite. we just sat there watchging and discussing what it mite be because there was no sound and my friend used to work at an airport by a army depot that had planes, jets fly out of. he knew what kind of things that was flying at that time. after a long period of time 10-15 minutes the objet tilted up and the sun was just coming up. when this thing tilted we both could see the whole object and it shot right out there and flew around the moon in a matter of a second or two. this sighting happened when 3 mile island accident happened, that same day they or the gov't. finally found out the reactor was not going to blow. i feel this thing was checking on the nuclear accident and mite have had something to do with stopping an accident from happening. these sight seem to happen around nuclear site and mite have just been watching also. 
  it would be nice to know if any other people saw what my friend and i saw. i can draw a picture of this object if really need too. when the object tilted it traveled in the same way. the disc had a raised area in the middle of the upper part of the disc and in the center of this raised area there was a black round area. plus there where rectangular windows on the side of the raised area. my friend still does not want to talk about it. i finally got him to talk about it this past summer of 2010 and this happened back in 1979 and every body ws scared from 3 mile island. but it was really odd that 3 mile island was over that same day.
thank you, *(wit's name deleted--cms/sg).
content.summary: Disc shape with a raised circular area middle of the top side with black area in center of raised area on top

content.detailedDescription: It was thanksgiving evening and i was driving home from my sisters house in provo, utah and i was coming up over a rise on the rode(hyway 6) nearing the junction of hyway 6 and hyway 89. when through the front window of my car i saw what apeard to be a dark green disc shaped object that had a very bright halo of light that incircled it coming straight down toward the mountain top in the southeast corner of said junction. i only had about 5 seconds or less to see it before it crashed on that mountain top. i don't really remember hearing any kind of a loud crash sound or exsplotion, but the bright light that it gave off when it crashed was so bright that it lit up the sky so bright that you had to close your eyes for a couple of seconds. then the sky was pitch black again. when i neared the said hyway junction there was on the left side of the road about 5 or 6 vehicles parked there, and on the road coming off of hyway 89 to hyway 6 another 4 or 5 vehicles was parked there. i kept on going because i instantly thought that the milatary would be there very soon, and i have heard of what they do to eye witnesses to something like this. i arived home in price, utah about half an hour later and turned the tv on to see if there was anything about the crash. i watched for about an hour and there was no reports of anything so i called the local tv station in salt lake city(chanel #2) to see if there was any report of said crash and they said there was not. so i reported to the man on the phone of what i had saw and he said that he would report it , but i never heard anymore about it. this is my report to you and i would swear on a stack of bibles or take a lie detector test to the fact that what i have told is the god's honest truth thank you and i sure hope i hear from you...[witness' name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: I saw a disc shaped ufo crash on a mountain top at southeast corner of hiway 6 and 89

content.detailedDescription: my husband and i put our daughter to bed and went back out to my car in the driveway. we left groceries in the trunk from earlier shopping that day. my husband was in front of me and he shut the trunk and all of a sudden there was a bright, white fire ball comming down from the dark sky. my husband said that the look on my face was so shocked that he looked up too. the fire ball stood still and then took off real fast in the opposite direction. it left a vapor trail of smoke .I was real "skeptical" of "ufo's" in the past. trust me, after that experience i am able to admit that there is no known explanation for what we both saw.I was fearful too after that. i kept thinking a lot about it and wondered if we would ever see it again. we joked between us about it. i use to say things when we woke up in the morning like, "did ya get abducted last night?" we laugh about it now; but we both were shocked that night and will never forget it. we also have a lot more respect for people who admit they have seen ufo's as well. what ever this was; was completely silent. maybe this is a stupid question, but why did it stop when we looked up and be still for a second or two? did it know we saw it? it went so fast out of sight that we lost sight within a second or two. the light was so bright.
content.summary: Like a comet; but going wrong direction and then left a vapor trail back up

content.detailedDescription: Just telling you about this so you can us it in comparison with other sightings.I have left info on other sights about this over the years.Me and my wife were on out way to louisiana to see our daughter in the early 90's.Somewhere between live oak  and talehassee fl we saw the ufo.We topped a hill on interstate 10.It was a long stretch going down hill.Off to our right and about a mile away i noticed these green lights moving from our right and angling toward us a little but moving to our left.They were over the tree line and like we were above them as we were higher up at top of this hill.Not a huge hill but for fl this was pretty high and very long.Think the road curved to the right at bottom.As i was driving down this long stretch i watched the craft until i could not see it because i was nearing the bottom of the hill and now the trees block it off.Suddenly there it was coming accross the road in front of us.I drove under it just as it entered the tree line on my left.I had my head tilted trying to see it better out the side window.Just as i was about to see the other side it disapeared as it moved above the trees on my left.It had what i remember as 6 green lights.They were green like the light on a key board.Not bright like a light bulb but just like on a keyboard.I zeroed in on one of the lights and see it was recessed and could see a rim and the lens was recessed in it.These lights where on the side that on aircraft has red lights.It made no sound and was so close to the tops of the trees it looked like it was almost hitting them.It moved at about the speed of a helicopter but it was so dark that night and i tried real hard to make out the shape of the object but could not make it out.The lights were 2 sets of three lights with both in the same pattern but the one to the right the same but a little higher.Kind of like a triangle with one light a little further apart and slightly cocked or tilted. three to the left and three to the right.Made me wonder at the time if it was two seperate objects or one object.It would probably be about the size of plane and bigger than a helicopter.I have seen lights just like this on ufo shows but always seem to be of another color than what we saw.I was so wraped up in what i was seeing that i never noticed that my wife was seeing it too.Just as it was out of sight my wife. suddenly said "that was weird".I told her baby we just saw a ufo.It surprised me that she noticed how unusal it was because she is not the type to reflect on stuff like that.We lived in loxahatchee fla and our house was directly under the landing pathway to the wpb airport.Always planes flying over our home constantly and we lived there 22 years and seeing planes dayly was a routine thing around our home.I was in the military transportations and was the coxswaine on a  mic 8 landing craft.I was always around planes and boats and ships.I know that planes and boats have port and starboad lights with one blinking or statinary white light.Red is on the left and green is on the right.To this day i still am up set that i did not see the lights on the other side.Will always wonder what color they would have been. i know what i saw and not sure if it was some military secret craft or something from who knows where.Just know it was definitly a ufo. i did not take notice of the day, year or month this happened.Just talked about it over the years with people.Just remember my grandson was maybe 2 or 3 years old and he is 21 now and in the air force.It was probably on a friday because we were on vacation.This actually happened and i know that these things exsist.Always wondered about this stuff and thought people were probably mistaking stuff.Now i know these things are real.0
content.summary: Multiple green lights moved accross road in front of truck

content.detailedDescription:
Working swing shift and living in boulder creek, ca we would comute on skyline bldv. around 12:30-2:00am (the mountain ridge that divides all of south bay area from the ocean)to back home from redwood city,ca.Wher we worked.

around palo alto county on top of the mountain one can see both the bay area lit up at night (on the left side driving south) and the beach and ocean on the right. very few people if any comuted that far from the bay area at that time.

around 1:00am on the ridge, we saw a large amber ball of light that came out of the pacific ocean at pescadero beach, ca north of santa cruz. it was a very clear night and could see the beach and waves (about 10 miles west from the road which is about 1,200' above sea level)

i told my partner to pull over in a turn out (he was scared), and he would not. so i reached over and took the keys out of the ignition to turn off the engine, and so he had to pulled over, and we stopped with the front lights on.

i jumped out of the car (1972 toyota landcruiser with a large spot light on top of the roof) excitedly waving my arms and jumping up and down to see what would happen as it moved closer to us and got larger and larger. my partner would not get out of the car and wanted to continue to go home.  

the amber large ball of light stopped in front of us with no sound (about 1,400-1,600' above see level and about 100 yards from us on the west side of the ridge (ocean side). i went to the car and jokingly ask my partner if we wanted to invite them for dinner. he said "let's go home". i decided to use the spot light on top of the roof and signal the object with an sos code ...---... of light.  at a complete stand still in front of us it responded by moving up and down, side to side, diagonally then came back to the same position (with no sound whatsoever) i repeated the signal many time (about for 20 minutes) and this large amber ball of light would respon to me with the same manuvers each time.  then within a second it took off straight up leaving a com trail (no sound) out of sight.

that mourning i called the san jose mercury to ask some questions to a "betty barnicle" that would do reports of these things.  i asked her if anything happened that night, and she said there was a sighting and descibed the same strange object (large amber ball of light) aound the same time (i never told or described what we saw).  she said the report of this same object was in pheonix, ar. my question is what is in the ocean at pescadero beach that is incompasse by the deep monterey bay.  i have a couple more incidences happening that same month if you would like to contact me. most people i have written to say that is too old of a story or don't answer me.

i flew every night in vietnam in a ov-1 mohawk for a year, and i know air craft, because i was stationed at hollowman air force base and would track us experimental air craft and could not reveal that until 10 years later.  i also knew the flight patterns of commercial air craft would go to san jose and sf airports.  this is a true but brief statements.
content.summary: Amber ball came from ocean and stopped in front of us

content.detailedDescription: I was returning home with my 15 year old daughter from her softball practice.  we were coming down the incline of hwy 74 east into lake elsinore, ca.  the view spans the whole valley.  over the murrieta / temecula area we spotted an overly large object that was white, was stationary, and long like a cigarette without the butt.  i instantly said "look, a ufo".  it looked like it was at least 10 miles away.  we both stared at the object and giggled uncomfortably.  we watched as much as we could given the winding road, however we came around a bend that blinded us to the sighting.  when we can came back around the bend it was gone.  we both were miffed.  i felt flush, kind of faint, because only a few seconds had passed and it was so big and was gone.  it would have been somewhere but we couldn't find it. my heart was beating so fast that i wanted to pull over but didn't.  i also did not want to alarm my daughter with weird actions. my daughter and i have not discussed it since but i think of it daily.
content.summary: 2 or 3 jumbo jets connected without wings or (long thin cigarette without the butt)

content.detailedDescription:
I believe it was late april or early may of 1996.  my husband is a pilot in the air force reserves and he was in florence, italy doing support missions for the bosnian war efforts.  two other wives and i had decided to join our husbands for a short visit, but first we were going to tour rome for four days prior to taking a train to where our husbands were.  i had decided to hire a young college student to housesit for me while out of the country and was in the process of "interviewing" her the evening of this particular sighting.  i had concluded our interview and was walking her to her car that was parked in my driveway.  it was a nice spring evening, lots of stars and lots of lights in the nearby distance of moreno valley which was about 7 miles from my home.  i should also mention here that this location is approximately 5 miles from march air force base in southern california.  anyway, as we were saying our goodbyes, movement in the sky to my left caught the corner of my eye and what i saw took my breath away....What i saw was an object enormous in size (the size of a football field)in the shape of a triangle with three red steady lights one at each point, moving very slowly and making no sound that i could detect at first....As it moved overhead, i could detect a "humming" sound.  this was nothing remotely close to anything we have aviation wise on this planet.  

i was completely mesermized, as was this young gal.  we both saw it and kept our eyes on it as it seemingly "floated" over my home towards the hills and mountain range behind my home.  it literally blocked out the evening sky and stars as it went over the house.  i said to the student, "you saw that right?"  she confirmed that she did and seemed as unsettled as i was about this sighting.  

later when i related this story to my husband, his tendancy was to blow it off as a "blimp", a stealth fighter...Etc.  there was no convincing him otherwise. i eventually gave up trying to convince anyone that this was a real ufo and let it fade into memory.  but let me tell you, i was born and raised in the air force and have had a love affair with aviation all my life, so when this happened, i knew it was out of the ordinary.

in the past few years there has been more and more sightings of unusual objects with a lot of media attention paid to these stories instead of being reported as hoaxes.  on more than one of these programs other people have witnessed the same type of craft i am describing here.  i finally don't feel so alone in this....

i wish i could remember the name of the student i hired to housesit for me, but she did such a horrible job of taking care of my animals and home that i wanted to put her out of mind as soon as possible.  

this has been cleansing...Thank you for providing a means for venting.
content.summary: Triangle shaped object flew over my home with little or no sound, with three steady red lights at each point of triangle.  it was huge....The size of a football field.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in the backseat of the car, father was driving and mother was in passenger seat, one car was in front of us. we were heading home from apache junction arizona toward phoenix on route 60 around the tomahawk rd. exit. all the exits ahead have an overpass, with a ramp coming down to the highway, i said to my dad, look at that truck coming toward us , it has 3 headlights. it looked as if it was coming down to the highway from an overpass, but as soon as i said that it "with lack of a better term" shot stright up and toward our car. it was floating about 100 yards in front, and about 30-40 feet above our car..We were traveling about 70mph at the time.It then "swooped over our car back and forth: from front to back of our sight:, it then went to the left of us, and was weaving back and forth between the light poles on the side of the road at the same exact speed of our car. it then again swooped up and was floating in front of the car, flew back and forth over the car a few more times and then shot out of our sight to the south into the desert. 

all this took abywhere from 2 to 4 minutes. my father and i were completely baffled by what we saw, and my mother was very frightened and crying. 

when the craft was "swooping, it was making 90 degree turns, and complete 180 stops and starts with a precision i have never seen. it would take off with a speed that i know without a doubt no technology we have will do. 

its size is hard to say, if i had to compare, i would say it was about the size of a small 2 seater plane. i could not see the structure. there was 3 lights and they were too bright to see a structure.

i can say beyond a shadow of a doubt that what we saw was unlike anything i have ever seen, and moved like nothing i have ever seen. 

its hard to explain in writing with good detail, but hopefully this was a good explaination. 

ive wanted all these years to report this and have not ever known anywhere to do it until i found out about this site through some reserach.

thank you and i hope someday i could know what we saw.
content.summary: 3 bright lights about 40 feet above us on the highway pacing our car

content.detailedDescription: i was chilling with a friend actually talking about ufo's when out of the corner of my eye i notice a very large object moving very slowly maybe 200 feet off the ground just cruising over walnut, which is one of the main roads that runs through rogers. my friend is a non believer and upon seeing this turned and went inside and refused to come out until it was gone. i was at a loss because i know what it resembled but it was dark and i could not make out the edges clearly because the color was either black or reflective and it reflected the night sky giving it a black appearance. but i could tell that it was triangular in shape because i saw its rear and it had four huge lights that glowed orange kind of like a jet turban. i had seen pictures of an aircraft that is rather large known as the stealth blimp. at the same time though this craft was a good deal larger than the descriptions i have read about the stealth blimp but i do not dismiss the idea that it was not. the object moved slow enough to be a blimp and seemed to be just cruising. i watched it for about three to four minutes when i lost site of it due to obstructions in town. it appeared to be as large as a super center parking lot and maybe four stories in height. my feelings on the subject was and still is indifferent, i know what i saw but i could not say with out conviction that it was absolutely not of this world. i had no camera except for my telephone and it was useless at night. my only witness to the event refused to stay and witness it. i know not if it was observed by anyone else but i did see a couple of car that was diving down walnut continue driving like nothing was there and passed right underneath it. this was also a way to get a reference of its size. when the whole craft came into view and a car drove under it at the speed limit of 35 mph it too a couple of seconds to be clear of it, i counted 2 and almost 3 seconds and at 52 feet a second i gathered it to be approximately 300 feet long give or take a few.
content.summary: Big black blimp

content.detailedDescription: This happen at night and this ufo did same moves 3 nights in a row and move very fast and jimp around. now when i look at i had some other thing to look at to make sure i was not seeing things one night i saw airpane and i know how airpane flys and this did not do what airpane will do and the ufo did the same thing i said it did.Next night the same ufo was in the same palce as the night befor now i had a falling star and i keep one eye on the falling star and the ufo and did the same thing as the night be for jumpingand moving around. the last nigth i had slow moving dot in the sky i think this was a sallite. now this ufo did the same thing so i did the same thing as befor and keep one eye on sallite and ufo and did the same thing as be for. the 4 th night it was gone not be seen any more. at time i was out side  ti did very differnt and stars don!T do that at all all it was a dot in the in sky and move arond with dacing around moviement. my feeling was this was some thing that will not do how dos this thing work  i have look at thing on nasa and i saw after i saw the ufo a spacecrafe fly in the sky some time after that and i sad must have seen a ufo i keep  this info and i can  recall what i saw. at time on the 3 nigtsi saw this never lost of this object on 3 nights i saw it.
content.summary: I saw this for 3 nights ina row  in same place every time.

content.detailedDescription:
Punched out where i work to take my lunch break,as is my custom i drove to the south end of our complex to eat in peace. i was parked facing due north.
as i was eating i noticed very strange, peculiar cloud formations, as if some of the clouds were forming vertical tubes that flared out at the bottom.
i got my cell phone and took 2 pics. the first has nothing in it, the second has what my wife thinks is a helicopter. i would swear that there was nothing in the sky that day except the clouds i was taking a picture of. i would have seen this as i was standing by my truck taking the picture looking up at these clouds....There was no helicopter in sight.
to see whatever this is on the 2nd pic look at the top left of the pic. i had to zoom in 400% to get a good look at it. i heard no engine noise, it must have have been at medium altitude,(10,000..15,000 feet?)it almost looks like it has camo paint, i don't know what this is, if it is a helicopter then so be it, if not you decide.
thank you
content.summary: Noticed peculiar cloud formations....Took 2 pics

content.detailedDescription: I was watching your show tonight and see that many people reported seeing a blue ball of light floating through the air. this is similar to what happened to me and my son. i was awoken to my son crying. a blue ball of light  was a foot away from my son's second story window. he was in the fetal position crying out my name. when i entered the room i felt frozen and the light was soft and calm. for a second i felt like a fish looking out from a aquarium being watched and observed. i reached over to pick him up and took him to my room to my wife. and went running out to get a look at it thinking there is no way it was still around, but looking to my neighbors yard the object was indeed there moving slowly drifting away. for minutes. (i found myself thinking i need to get this on film, but when looking at it. you think it is only for seconds then it's minutes. i found that i was mesmerized and intriguing of what is going on that time flow by.. all my life i have seen things that where unnatural in the sky. but nothing like this.
content.summary: Ball of light outside son's window

content.detailedDescription: I live in a house on the detroit river across from winsor, ontario.  i woke up at about 7 am on the morning of 2/3/11.  i got up to take the trash out to the end of the driveway.  i went downstairs and took the trash out, it was still rather dark and very quiet outside.  i came back upstairs to get back in the bed.  on my way past the windows that look out over the detroit river, i noticed a very bright light in the sky.  the light was on the canadian side of the river. it was so bright that i stopped to watch it to see if it was an airplane coming from winsor, canada.  there were no navigation lights and i didn't hear any engine noise. i also looked up to see if there were any stars visible and i couldn't see any.  the strange light didn't move, it just sat there and was very white with a silver edge on the right side.  i still thought it might be an airplane, but i knew that airplanes don't typically fly over that early. it looked like a sphere, but i could see that it was somewhat oval.  it seemed that the brightness obscured the actual shape, the clearest view was on the right side of the light.  i was so sleepy that i decided to take a couple photos of it and get back in the bed.  after i got in the bed, i listened to see if i could hear or see (through the sky light) an airplane fly over the house, but i didn't hear or see anything over the next few minutes. i went back to sleep.  during the years that i've lived here, i've never seen any light like this in the sky during the morning hours.  it didn't flicker like a star and it didn't fluctuate like an airplane light.  this light was very still and extreemly bright.  i don't know what it was but, it's bothered me ever since i saw it.  i hope i never see it again!
content.summary: I saw a strange light in the sky and took a couple of photos of it.

content.detailedDescription:
The weather was perfectly clear, blue sky,no clouds and was approximetly 12:20pm. i was driving west and because the sky was so bright and clear i just glanced over the scenery and saw this big silvery thing in the south west sky. it was a "silver bullet shaped object,may of had segments or indents too. the ends were rounded like a pill carrier. i couldnt judge how far away it was. i kept looking expecting it to move like a plane but it just stayed up in the sky,no movement,no contrails.
 i looked for wings but all i could see vagely were the outline of triangle "hooks".
the occupant in my car saw it also. have not been able to stop thinking about this. it lasted about 5 min then it disappeared. no contrails seen,it never moved..As i looked back it just disappeared.
i have been thinking about this all day,have a headache/pressure. i can't explain it
content.summary: Sky - perfectly clear - blue.  driving west and saw a silver colored "bullet" ,motionless,no contrail.

content.detailedDescription:
On december 21, 2010 (winter solstice) i was taking images as the moon eclipsed.  i live in sandbridge beach, which is in virginia's outer banks and an isolated area of virginia beach.

sandbridge beach is essentially a five mile sandbar that is attached to the mainland and juts out into the ocean.  it is defined by two main roads punctuated by one stop light. it is a thriving beach community  in the summer, but very underpopulated in the winter. i am at the end of sandbridge beach, just before the back bay national wildlife refuge. 

i was very excited about seeing this historic lunear eclipse, as a deserted sandbar is the perfect place to see an eclipse in all its glory. no people, per se.  no lights in the direction of the west. and i was alone when i took the images.

i took maybe 20 pictures during the (approximately) 1.5 hour eclipse.  at last the moon totally eclipsed and sandbridge beach was engulfed in pitch black darkness. so i just held the camera steady and clicked away, hoping for the best.  it wasn't until i downloaded the images that i noticed one very curious frame. i saw four, fiery circular shapes in one frame.  i was clicking clicking instantaneously in succession.

maybe the fiery circles are just flying insects...I don't know.  but i'm curious enough to show you the image of the four, oval-shaped objects.  what troubles me is that i don't recall seeing any lights anywhere at the exact time the moon totally eclipsed. i'm absolutely sure of that. but, on that night, even the air felt surreal.

my son said he has spotted multiple ufo's, but he didn't share this with me until recently. i guess he didn't want to scare me. perhaps he's been seeing ifos, as virginia beach has the sixth largest naval base in the world. on the other hand, we are used to the sound of planes over sandbridge beach. on the night of the lunear eclipse, i did not hear any noise and i have very sharp hearing.

-end
content.summary: Four bright circles of light appear in photo during moon's eclipse.

content.detailedDescription: My father was in the usaf and we were stationed at a small military hospital outside cambridge england.  we were living on the third floor of an apartment building.  me and my brother shared a room that had a big window with a window seat in front of it.  we usually slept with the curtins open.  this happened late at night, the whole room lit up and the light awakened me.  as i woke i looked out the window and at the time and fore manny years what i saw i thought i had seen a skeleton out side the window just hovering but now i know what i saw was an alien.  at the time i saw a skelital head with big eyes, but after the years and knowing what i know and have seen it had to be alien.  i was 7 at the time (i am now 61) and was so scared i woke my brother and we ran to my parrents room.  when dad went to check our room it was gone.  being on the 3rd floor of the building has always bothered me.
content.summary: Saw an alien

content.detailedDescription:
I was returning home from school that thursday evening, my class had released early so i was enjoying the beautiful sunset on my way home. through the trees the magnitude of brightness the sun was producing struck me as odd, i thought to myself "wow the sun is big tonight". as i rounded the corner the sun came into center view. it looked like it was on fire. i rubbed my eyes a bit and tried to focus, to make sure i was really seeing the sun that way, grabbed my glasses and realized i wasn���t seeing things, the sun really did look like a ball of fire. so i pulled my car over and began taking pictures with my iphone from my car window. i remembered i had my camera in my bag so i got out of the car and stood on the guardrail and snapped away with my cannon power shot. after several minutes i got in my car and drove a bit farther down the road to get a different angle on the picture and began to shoot again. i was so proud of my sunset pictures; i had never seen anything like that before. i showed friends, everyone amazed by the sun. today i was uploading to my computer, and began inspecting the pictures more carefully and came to find several objects or smudges in the images. you can see all the photos taken at *(link moved to additional evidence section -- cms/sg).I hope someone analyzes these pictures, because i really do not know what i captured, but there is something there. 
i have lived within flight patterns for both bwi and national my entire life, i can pick the planes out in the pictures, and it is the other objects i am unsure of.
content.summary: Objects not seen by naked eye found in pictures of sunset near d.C.
